q1: Why isn't there anything to talk about
a1: Well let's talk about football. How much time do you spend watching it?
q2: Too much time - there are so many leagues and great teams to watch.
q3: the english league the best of all
a3: I love to spend money watching football at home with my friend
q4: How much do you spend watching football?
a4: I usually spend about $20 per day watching football.
q5: How much of that $20 is spent on beer and snacks?
a5: I never eat snacks whilst watching football
